name: Remap

inputs.name: Input Min
inputs.description: The lower bound of the old range

inputs.name: Input Max
inputs.description: The upper bound of the old range

inputs.name: Output Min
inputs.description: The lower bound of the new range

inputs.name: Output Max
inputs.description: The upper bound of the new range

inputs.name: Clamp
inputs.description: This value is false by default. When it is set to true, clamp the input value A between Output Min and Output Max.

description: Remap a value from an old range to a new range.
